author: Daily Herald Report
title: Kristufek's Hawthorne selections for Saturday's races
text:
Here is today's link to Daily Herald handicapper Joe Kristufek's selections for Hawthorne Racecourse on Saturday, Oct. 17.
Click on the attached PDF listed below to download and then print Joe's selections.
